RosUtils Class Reference

This class is used for publishing the ouput rectangles in ROS. More...

Detailed Description

This class is used for publishing the ouput rectangles in ROS.

Author:
Social Robot

Member Function Documentation

RegionOfInterest RosUtils::cvrect2rosroi ( Rect  rect  ) 

This function returns a given rectangle in a regionofinterest used in ROS.

Returns:
Parameters:
template2d A Mat containing a binary image.
template3d A Mat containing a grayscale image. Notice that template3d is a grayscale image, it is used 3d when the matching is done with the depth image.
